EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Thank you for participating in the NCR Customer Satisfaction Survey 2021. Your feedback matters to us. Your insights allow us to continue to improve how we support your business and make it easier for you to do business with NCR. We are currently analyzing your feedback and will reach back out once we have defined the improvements and actions we plan to undertake in response to your input. Thank you once more for being a customer of NCR.
